inputs.name: boot_disk_size
inputs.description: Size of boot disk to create for the cluster controller node

inputs.name: boot_disk_type
inputs.description: Type of boot disk to create for the cluster controller node

inputs.name: cloudsql
inputs.description: Define an existing CloudSQL instance to use instead of instance-local MySQL

inputs.name: cluster_name
inputs.description: Name of the cluster

inputs.name: compute_node_scopes
inputs.description: Scopes to apply to compute nodes.

inputs.name: compute_node_service_account
inputs.description: Service Account for compute nodes.

inputs.name: controller_image
inputs.description: Slurm image to use for the controller instance

inputs.name: controller_instance_template
inputs.description: Instance template to use to create controller instance

inputs.name: controller_machine_type
inputs.description: Compute Platform machine type to use in controller node creation

inputs.name: controller_scopes
inputs.description: Scopes to apply to the controller

inputs.name: controller_secondary_disk
inputs.description: Create secondary disk mounted to controller node

inputs.name: controller_secondary_disk_size
inputs.description: Size of disk for the secondary disk

inputs.name: controller_secondary_disk_type
inputs.description: Disk type (pd-ssd or pd-standard) for secondary disk

inputs.name: controller_service_account
inputs.description: Service Account for the controller

inputs.name: deployment_name
inputs.description: Name of the deployment

inputs.name: disable_compute_public_ips
inputs.description: If set to true, create Cloud NAT gateway and enable IAP FW rules

inputs.name: disable_controller_public_ips
inputs.description: If set to true, create Cloud NAT gateway and enable IAP FW rules

inputs.name: jwt_key
inputs.description: Specific libjwt key to use

inputs.name: labels
inputs.description: Labels to add to controller instance. List of key key, value pairs.

inputs.name: login_node_count
inputs.description: Number of login nodes in the cluster

inputs.name: munge_key
inputs.description: Specific munge key to use

inputs.name: network_storage
inputs.type:
list(object({
    server_ip     = string,
    remote_mount  = string,
    local_mount   = string,
    fs_type       = string,
    mount_options = string
  }))
inputs.description: An array of network attached storage mounts to be configured on all instances.

inputs.name: partitions
inputs.type:
list(object({
    name                 = string,
    machine_type         = string,
    max_node_count       = number,
    zone                 = string,
    image                = string,
    image_hyperthreads   = bool,
    compute_disk_type    = string,
    compute_disk_size_gb = number,
    compute_labels       = any,
    cpu_platform         = string,
    gpu_type             = string,
    gpu_count            = number,
    network_storage = list(object({
      server_ip     = string,
      remote_mount  = string,
      local_mount   = string,
      fs_type       = string,
      mount_options = string
    })),
    preemptible_bursting = bool,
    vpc_subnet           = string,
    exclusive            = bool,
    enable_placement     = bool,
    regional_capacity    = bool,
    regional_policy      = any,
    instance_template    = string,
    static_node_count    = number
  }))
inputs.description: An array of configurations for specifying multiple machine types residing in their own Slurm partitions.

inputs.name: project_id
inputs.description: Compute Platform project that will host the Slurm cluster

inputs.name: region
inputs.description: Compute Platform region where the Slurm cluster will be located

inputs.name: shared_vpc_host_project
inputs.description: Host project of shared VPC

inputs.name: subnetwork_name
inputs.description: The name of the pre-defined VPC subnet you want the nodes to attach to based on Region.

inputs.name: suspend_time
inputs.description: Idle time (in sec) to wait before nodes go away

inputs.name: zone
inputs.description: Compute Platform zone where the servers will be located
